text: The Daewoo Leganza was a 4-door automobile produced by GM Daewoo. It offered a lot of space and equipment for not a lot of money. Only 1 generation was made over a 5 year run. It replaced the Daewoo Espero in 1997 and in 2000 the similarly sized Daewoo Magnus launched with the Leganza continuing until 2002. == Engine == * 2.0 98 kW (133 hp) Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Daewoo Leganza
